headline: Is McKesson Corporation (MCK) The Best Healthcare Dividend Stock to Invest in?
summary: We recently published a list of 13 Best Healthcare Dividend Stocks to Invest in. In this article, we are going to take a look at where McKesson Corporation (NYSE:MCK) stands against other best healthcare dividend stocks to invest in. The US healthcare sector has been at the forefront since the emergence of COVID-19 in 2020, […]
